snippet: The World Trade Organization warned that international trade would grow by only 3.7 percent in 2012 after decelerating sharply last year, suggesting the global economy is losing steam.
lead_paragraph: The World Trade Organization warned that international trade would grow by only 3.7 percent in 2012 after decelerating sharply last year, suggesting the global economy is losing steam.

headline.seo: W.T.O. Warns of Global Trade Slowdown in 2012
headline.main: W.T.O. Warns of Global Trade Slowdown in 2012
